dmca.title: (C) software on Theplanet
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Lalonde [mailto:michael__lalonde@hotmail.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, September 20, 2006 4:51 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: (C) software on Theplanet
Subject: (C) software on Theplanet


Dear Theplanet.com

According to my records, www.hardabasht.com, or more specifically
http://gamebase64.hardabasht.com ( fd.3e.5446.static.theplanet.com ) is
hosted by you. This server is being used to host copyrighted games. 
Specifically over 10,000 titles are available, all commercial software.
Some of this software I have written, but the majority of it belongs to
large companies such as Epyx, Br0derfund, Synapse, Virgin Games, etc.

Visit www.gb64.com or gamebase64.com and notice each game links to
"Latif" 
which is the server on your server. These are all games indexed by
"cracker" 
the group who broke the protection scheme.

Thank you for your time

_________________________________________________________________
Buy what you want when you want it on Sympatico / MSN Shopping
http://shopping.sympatico.msn.ca/content/shp/?ctId=2,ptnrid=176,ptnrdata
=081805
